## Workflow.latestOutput() method

Get the latest output value

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
latestOutput(name?: string): Maybe<TableContainer>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The output to retrieve. If falsy, this will observe the default output of the final step. |
